ðŸ“– Summary: Cap is a privacy-first, self-hosted CAPTCHA alternative that replaces traditional visual challenges with a lightweight, JavaScript-based proof-of-work system. It aims to be fast, dependency-free, and easily integrable into modern web applications, offering a more accessible and private user experience.
